Posts.Content: Hi Future, I have just joined this group although was diagnosed in 2012. I have suffered with dry eyes and flaky nails and found a miracle cure!!! Provided your blood tests come back as normal I would try Omega 3 1000mg capsules! This has worked wonders for my nails and eyes! I think mine is caused by Tamoxifen!Â  Hope this helps xx
Posts.Title: Fingernails!
